alert.note: Alert for San Rafael Swell (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 01 at 7:22PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Emery County through 745 PM MDT... At 721 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southwest of Green River, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Green River and Elgin. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 between mile markers 149 and 164. US Route 6 between mile markers 295 and 300. Utah Route 24 between mile markers 155 and 160. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
